channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How to plan for the end of your life if you don’t have kids or a spouse
Why today's wild swing in stocks is a warning of what lies ahead for investors
Citadel profits as shares of video-game maker Ubisoft tumble 30%
Why Goldman Sachs is again lifting its gold price forecast
Tariff tensions cool after business leaders tell CNBC Europe must consider retaliating against Trump’s ‘blackmail’
item.description: European business groups have called for the EU to consider countermeasures in response to U.S. tariff threats.

item.title: France rejects Trump's comment on drug prices, calls it 'fake news'
Top five takeaways from Trump's interview with CNBC
item.description: Trump earlier in the day said he reached a framework with NATO Secretary Mark Rutte that appears to stave off Trump's threats to Greenland.

item.title: Fed Governor Lisa Cook seems safe from Trump firing after Supreme Court arguments
item.description: Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell planned to attend the oral arguments at the Supreme Court.

item.title: Trump says he reached Greenland deal 'framework' with NATO, backs off Europe tariffs
item.description: Trump suggested to CNBC that the Greenland framework involves mineral rights for the U.S., as well as the administration's proposed "Golden Dome" syst...

item.title: Big Tech stocks haven’t been this cheap in months. Is it time to buy?
